name: Chicken Avocado Salad
description: Fresh and filling salad with grilled chicken, creamy avocado, and a tangy lime dressing. Low-carb and satisfying.

instructions.instruction: Season chicken breast with salt, pepper, and 1 tablespoon olive oil.
Preheat a grill pan over medium-high heat.
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until cooked through.
Let chicken rest for 5 minutes, then slice.
Prepare dressing: Whisk remaining olive oil, lime juice, honey, and garlic.
Arrange mixed greens on plates or in bowls.
Top with sliced chicken, avocado, tomatoes, cucumber, and onion.
Drizzle with dressing and garnish with cilantro.

tips: Great for low-carb or keto diets.
Add feta cheese or corn for variety.
Add hard-boiled egg for extra protein.
storageInfo: Best served fresh. Store dressing separately if making ahead.
servingSuggestion: Serve with crusty bread or tortilla chips.
variations: Shrimp or salmon work great as alternatives.
Add black beans for extra fiber and protein.
